items.name: A bag of delicious boiled sweets
items.description: A bag of delicious boiled sweets.

items.name: A basket of snakes, intended for juggling
items.description: A basket of snakes, intended for juggling.

items.name: A battered hat with a stuffed swan's head stitched proudly at the summit
items.description: A battered hat with a stuffed swan's head stitched proudly at the summit.

items.name: A bone whistle
items.description: A bone whistle. When blown at night, it sends nearby bats and night birds into a frenzy.

items.name: A bottle containing dirty water from the Baths of Astralon
items.description: A bottle containing dirty water from the Baths of Astralon.

items.name: A bottle of ink that always seems to spill everywhere when opened
items.description: A bottle of ink that always seems to spill everywhere when opened.

items.name: A bronze statuette of a chimera made up of a dozen different animals
items.description: A bronze statuette of a chimera made up of a dozen different animals. The person who gave it to you insists it depicts a real creature.

items.name: A burial shroud seemingly imprinted with a face
items.description: A burial shroud seemingly imprinted with a face. The face becomes more distinguishable every day.

items.name: A ceramic plate that emits a simple tune when scratched
items.description: A ceramic plate that emits a simple tune when scratched.

items.name: A collection of fungi, loaned to you by a mossling
items.description: A collection of fungi, loaned to you by a mossling.

items.name: A dead crow in a bag
items.description: A dead crow in a bag. Before you killed it, you were pretty sure it was spying on you.

items.name: A fake moustache
items.description: A fake moustache. When worn, you appear to have a full beard.

items.name: A forbidden treatise claiming grimalkins and woodgrues share the same ancestors
items.description: A forbidden treatise claiming grimalkins and woodgrues share the same ancestors.

items.name: A glass case with a giant moth pinned inside
items.description: A glass case with a giant moth pinned inside.

items.name: A harp shaped like a duck
items.description: A harp shaped like a duck. Playing it attracts the attention of nearby waterfowl.

items.name: A harp string, sharp and tinged with blood
items.description: A harp string, sharp and tinged with blood.

items.name: A hooded cloak made from thousands of moth wings stitched together
items.description: A hooded cloak made from thousands of moth wings stitched together.

items.name: A mead tankard that is perpetually sticky
items.description: A mead tankard that is perpetually sticky.

items.name: A misshapen ocarina
items.description: A misshapen ocarina. Each note sounds eerily similar to a baby's cries.

items.name: A mossling pipe you found in a pile of compost
items.description: A mossling pipe you found in a pile of compost. Its smoke makes people nostalgic.

items.name: A note promising that a "Mr Fox" will come to your aid in your hour of greatest need
items.description: A note promising that a "Mr Fox" will come to your aid in your hour of greatest need.

items.name: A pair of matching eyeballs
items.description: A pair of matching eyeballs. Whenever possible, they rotate to stare at you.

items.name: A pair of small, bronze cymbals
items.description: A pair of small, bronze cymbals.

items.name: A personalised invitation to "THE FEAST."
items.description: A personalised invitation to "THE FEAST." No further details are provided.

items.name: A pocketbook of bad jokes
items.description: A pocketbook of bad jokes. Emits the occasional snicker.

items.name: A poster for your parent's last, ill-fated circus performance
items.description: A poster for your parent's last, ill-fated circus performance.

items.name: A quill made from a stirge-owl feather
items.description: A quill made from a stirge-owl feather.

items.name: A rope woven from a mix of human and breggle hair
items.description: A rope woven from a mix of human and breggle hair.

items.name: A stack of angry letters, all accusing you of arson
items.description: A stack of angry letters, all accusing you of arson.

items.name: A strange disk that produces the sound of flatulence whenever a weight is placed atop it
items.description: A strange disk that produces the sound of flatulence whenever a weight is placed atop it.

items.name: A tent that slowly raises itself when you loudly sing it a jaunty song
items.description: A tent that slowly raises itself when you loudly sing it a jaunty song.

items.name: A vial of guano
items.description: A vial of guano. Your last reminder of a deceased loved one.

items.name: A wooden sceptre topped with a jester's head
items.description: A wooden sceptre topped with a jester's head. When struck, the head tells an ill-considered joke.

items.name: An advice book that ultimately suggests a liberal application of fire as the solution to every problem
items.description: An advice book that ultimately suggests a liberal application of fire as the solution to every problem.

items.name: An ancient coin, stolen from a grave
items.description: An ancient coin, stolen from a grave. Far colder to the touch than it should be.

items.name: An empty pan flute case, its contents stolen
items.description: An empty pan flute case, its contents stolen.

items.name: An enormous firework with a tag that reads "Untested."
items.description: An enormous firework with a tag that reads "Untested."

items.name: An extravagant wig, stolen from the head of an elf noble
items.description: An extravagant wig, stolen from the head of an elf noble.

items.name: An ordinary-looking metal bucket
items.description: An ordinary-looking metal bucket. When filled with water, leeches appear inside.

items.name: An ornate flute, said to be handed down by your ancestors since before they left Fairy
items.description: An ornate flute, said to be handed down by your ancestors since before they left Fairy.

items.name: An unhatched egg that sweats blood
items.description: An unhatched egg that sweats blood.

items.name: Faded parchment that lists the names of everyone you've ever wronged
items.description: Faded parchment that lists the names of everyone you've ever wronged. It updates itself periodically.

items.name: Light from a fireworks display, caught in a shard of glass
items.description: Light from a fireworks display, caught in a shard of glass.

items.name: Lyrics to a half-written song about rodents visiting from the moon
items.description: Lyrics to a half-written song about rodents visiting from the moon.

items.name: Small vials of syrups, each labelled with the type of mood they're supposed to cure
items.description: Small vials of syrups, each labelled with the type of mood they're supposed to cure.

items.name: The corpse of a mouse, dressed in tiny clothes
items.description: The corpse of a mouse, dressed in tiny clothes.

items.name: The crest of an unknown longhorn noble house, found on a dead breggle
items.description: The crest of an unknown longhorn noble house, found on a dead breggle.

items.name: The squirming pieces for maggot chess
items.description: The squirming pieces for maggot chess.

items.name: Woollen ear warmers, knitted by your grandmother
items.description: Woollen ear warmers, knitted by your grandmother.

items.name: Your uncle's famed recipe for moth cakes
items.description: Your uncle's famed recipe for moth cakes.
